New Records: Arshdeep Singh achieved his career-best bowling figures with 4 wickets for 9 runs.
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored an unbeaten 50 off 49 balls.
Shivam Dube remained unbeaten on 31, helping India secure the win.
Saurabh Netravalkar dismissed both Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma early in the innings.
Arshdeep Singh took 4 wickets for 9 runs, including a two-wicket opening over.
Hardik Pandya bowled a wicket-maiden in the 17th over.
Pre-Game Insights: USA had never played at Nassau County Stadium before, while it was India's fourth game at the venue.
USA's designated captain Monank Patel was out injured.
Rohit Sharma won the toss and chose to field in seaming conditions.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav was praised for his crisis management during the chase.
Shivam Dube's unbeaten 31 was seen as a confidence booster after a hard-fought innings.
USA still has a chance to progress to the Super Eights with a win or washout against Ireland.
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA were warned twice for delaying the game and were penalized five runs for a third delay.
Saurabh Netravalkar dropped a crucial catch of Suryakumar Yadav, which could have been a turning point.
